open.message1: 1. You trade in contract market, if the market situation is not good enough and your position margin is insufficient, TigerMEX Swap will make your position in liquidation delegating and disclose liquidation details  according to the system appointment.
open.message2: 2. You need to read TigerMEX Swap business rules carefully and apply with it, to know the mechanism of contract and operation principle, to know various of market risks.
open.message3: 3. In some extreme market situation, you may find that it’s impossible to close the held open contract. For example, when your profits ranks first in the effective leverage PNL pf entire contract market, and your against position’s insurance fund is insufficient to cover the loss caused by over loss.
open.message4: 4. Due to the changes in Australia’s laws, regulations and policies, the changes of trading rules of contract exchange and issued emergency measures, TigerMEX will disclose the statement in advance, and the open positions you hold may not be able to be held anymore, but the margin and profits will be cashed.
open.message5: 5. Due to the reasons beyond the control of TigerMEX, such as earthquake, flood, fire and other force majeure factors or computer systems, communication system failures, etc., your order may not be filled or can not be completed, you may be responsible for the resulting losses.
open.message6: 6. Hedging transactions, like speculative trading, are also subject to risks arising from price fluctuations.
open.message7: 7. if you did not do KYC2 real name authentication or did not bind Google verification, or lend your account to someone else, that may affect the security of your contract margin.
open.messageBtn: I have known the risks, continue to open contract account.
open.tips: Open contract account, claim trading bonus immediately

common.orderCancel5: Partial cancellation due to partial close position
common.orderCancel6: Partial cancellation due to forced liquidation
common.orderCancel8: Partial cancellation due to profit taking
common.orderCancel9: Partial cancellation due to position error
common.orderCancel11: Pending order in the opposite direction
common.orderCancel12: FOK Order, fully filled or cancelled by system
common.orderCancel13: IOC order，filled immediately or cancelled by system
common.orderCancel14: The filled price deviates from market order，partial order is cancelled by system
common.orderCancel15: Post only, Taker order will be cancelled by system.
common.orderCancel16: Liquidated，unfilled order is cancelled by system
common.orderCancel17: play order，partial order is cancelled by system
common.orderCancel18: Position is forced liquidated, partial order is cancelled by system
common.orderCancelPO: PO order(only as Maker), Post-only order will be added to the order book and not executed immediately
common.orderCancelFOK: FOK deal, the deal must be filled immediately in its entirety or not executed at all.
common.orderCancelIOC: IOC deal, the deal will execute fully or partially immediately and any unfilled portion canceled

stopProfitLoss.stop_profit_long: Take-profit price needs to be higher than {price}
stopProfitLoss.stop_profit_short: Take-profit price needs to be lower than {price}
stopProfitLoss.stop_loss_long: The stop loss price needs to be lower than the current {price} and higher than the liquidation price
stopProfitLoss.stop_loss_short: The stop loss price needs to be higher than the current {price} and lower than the liquidation price
stopProfitLoss.placeInputPOrderPrice: Please input the order execution price!
stopProfitLoss.placeInputLOrderPrice: Please input stop loss order execution price!
stopProfitLoss.placeInputPTriggerPrice: Please input the trigger price of stop earning order!
stopProfitLoss.placeInputLTriggerPrice: Please input stop loss order trigger price!

footer.webDesc: The Leading Assets Trading Platform Specializing in Financial Derivatives

header.title: TigerMEX Cryptocurrency Trading _ Contract Trading_Mining and Distribute Trading Platform
header.description: TigerMEX is the world's leading Bitcoin Ethereum trading platform, innovating digital asset contract transactions, transaction mining, platform currency distribute mode, providing users with secure and stable Bitcoin, Ethereum, EOS, XDAG and other digital asset trading services.
header.keywords: Bitcoin Trading, Ethereum Trading, Ethereum, ETH, BTC, Bitcoin, Ethereum Quotes, Trading Mining, Distribute, Platform Currency
header.lineSwitchGuide: Try switching lines here when the page loads slowly

typeTitle.nextExchange: The next funds rate exchange time is：
typeTitle.needValue: Short needs to compensate long position holding {value}.
typeTitle.needValueTwo: long needs to compensate Short position holding {value}.
typeTitle.minAndMaxRate: The maximum funding rate is {max} and the minimum is {min}
typeTitle.distanceNextFundsRate1: Until the next  funds rate exchange：{time}hour
typeTitle.distanceNextFundsRate2: Until the next  funds rate exchange：{time}

calculatorPage.message: The calculation results are for reference only. In actual operation, there may be deviations in operation results due to handling fees and funding rates.
calculatorPage.a1: Missing the necessary parameters, please complete the parameters！

typeTitle.warning: The {name} contract is an innovative contract with extremely high risks. Please pay attention to the liquidity risk before trading and make prudent decisions.
typeTitle.warning2: The {name} contract is an innovative contract with high risks. Please pay attention to price deviation and liquidity risk before trading and make prudent decisions.

submitEntrust.leverageHover: The leverage when you submit an order, when there is a position, will be merged into the current position.
submitEntrust.balanceHover: Can be used as the mergin to open position.
submitEntrust.maxMessage: Trigger price and fair price deviation are too large，Whether to confirm the plan？
submitEntrust.minMeaage: Trigger price and fair price deviation are too small，Whether to confirm the plan？
submitEntrust.planSetPriceDesc: The current trigger price type is the {type}. When the {type} in the market reaches the trigger price, the commission will be submitted to the market according to the execution price and quantity. The trigger price type can be changed in Settings below.
submitEntrust.nologin1: Create an account in just a few seconds.Start trading immediately
submitEntrust.nologin2: You must be logged in to view this content

message.a1: Please enter the price and quantity of the order！
message.a2: Please make sure the quantity of the order equals to or is more than{minVol}pieces！
message.a3: The maximum pieces can be open is{maxVol}！
message.a6: No available position can be closed on this direction！
message.b1: The unrealized PNL&ROE% from the start of opening position
message.b2: The transfer amount should not be blank！
message.b3: The transfer amount is larger than account balance！
message.b5: Please make sure the quantity of the order equals to or is less than{maxVol}pieces！

forcedNotes.limitedPriceOpen: Opening price deviation from the latest transaction price is too large, please pay attention to the risk
forcedNotes.limitedPriceUnwind: Closing price deviation from the latest transaction price is too large, please pay attention to the risk
forcedNotes.marketPriceOpen: It is estimated that the opening average price is too large from the latest transaction price, please pay attention to the risk
forcedNotes.marketPriceUwind: It is estimated that the average closing price is too large from the latest transaction price, please pay attention to the risk

risk.riskHoverOne: When your position size is too large, your leverage rate will be limited.
risk.riskHoverTwo: If the risk limit exceeds the upper limit on the right, your new submitted order will be required a higher margin rate.

cp.messageOne: TigerMEX uses slip step risk limit, as to XBTUSD contract, the base risk limit is 200 XBT.
cp.messageTwo: As to the limit increases of each 100 XBT position, the maintenance margin and initial margin need to be increased 0.50%.
cp.messageThree: For more details please check here

cp.blowingUpOne: 1When{time},{name}the fair price of the contact falls down to{price}，your position{name}-{positionType}-margin rate's <{mmr}maintenance margin rate，that triggers liquidation.
cp.blowingUpTwo: 2According to the balance of insurance funds and maintenance margin，the order enters the market at {price} ，and also is settled according to the order price, but maybe the actual liquidation price of the position does not equal to the order price.
cp.blowingUpFive: 1在{time}，fair price is{price}，due to the insufficiaent of system insurance funds, and according to the ranking of PNL, it will auto-deleverage your order and against order at price{dealPrice}.
cp.positionMesage: During being executed, your entire position will be closed
cp.positionsPriceOne: Nominal value of position at the current reasonable price
cp.unwindPriceOne: As a long, it may trigger liquidation when fair price is lower than this price
cp.unwindPriceTwo: As a short, it may trigger liquidation when fair price is higher than this price
cp.unwindPriceThree: Adjust position strategy, or margin call when it is on position fixing, that will change this price
cp.onMoneyOne: PNL of historic positions, which are totally liquidated
cp.onMoneyTwo: Realized PNL from the start of opening the current position
cp.marginHoverTwo: the words between the brackets mean the actual leverage rate of your current position.
cp.openPriceHover: The average price to open your current position.
cp.avgCostHover: Avg cost  refers to the average cost price of positions
cp.interestsUserHover: The full equity of your current contract account.
cp.rateHover1: The current unrealized profit and loss is the estimated profit and loss at a reasonable price, and the final profit and loss is subject to the actual price.
cp.rateHover2: The current unrealized profit and loss is the estimated profit and loss when the latest price is liquidated, and the final profit and loss is subject to the actual price.
cp.detailsOfFundingFeesCare: The funding adjustment between longs and shorts is to tether to spot price. TigerMEX does not charge any fees on funding; it is exchanged directly peer-to-peer. Funding Fees  will be included in the position has realized profit and loss.

message.a2: The margin entered is unreasonable, please re-enter!

errno.success: In {time}, {contract}'s {priceType}{downOrUp} to {price}, the automatic commissioning of the plan is triggered and the trigger is successful.
errno.failure: At {time}, {contract}'s {priceType}{downOrUp} to {price}, the automatic execution of the plan delegate is triggered, the trigger fails, the reason for the failure: {errno}.

newsDeal.cancelHover: Cancel all your orders at this price.
newsDeal.fairPriceOne: Fair Price：here means the current reasonable price contains funding rate, which affects market.
newsDeal.fairPriceTwo: Click and view Fair price introduction
newsDeal.ADLHoverOne: Your position is the highest position in the profit queue.
newsDeal.ADLHoverTwo: When all the 5 lights are all on, you are in front of the ADL queue.
newsDeal.blowHintMe: Forced liquidation orders at {price},Click "X" to cancel your order at this price

layouts.error: This page does not exist，there are{time}seconds left

funding.messageOne: Here is the list of the historic funds rate of all contracts.
funding.messageTwo: *It will announce the next 8 hrs' funds rate after the settlement of funds cost each time.

insure.messageOne: TigerMEX Swap uses insurance funds to guarantee the completion of liquidation process. when the loss of the position is more than margin, the insurance funds will cover bankrupt loss.
insure.messageTwo: The increase of insurance funds comes from the liquidation deal price, which is higher than bankrupt price in market
insure.messageThree: 。You can check the current and historic amount of insurance funds below.

bonus.title: TigerMEX Perpetual Contract Bonus Never Stop
bonus.message: Register bonus, deposit bonus,surprises are on the way! More bonus events will be launched gradually...
bonus.messageNew: Open contracts, participate in activities, project airdrops, trading competitions, numerous events, etc.
bonus.dataTime: Data will be calculated from 8:00 AM, August 26, 2019
bonus.openTUSD: Open the TUSD simulation contract transaction and receive an additional 10,000
bonus.activeTwo: 1. For each user who meets the conditions, a trading bonus will be given to the corresponding item, and the trading bonus can be used for contract trading, which will exist in your contract account;
bonus.activeThree: 2. The bonus for the inviting friends will be counted from the same day, and the fee generated by the invited user is also applicable;
bonus.activeFore: 3. For the accumulated statistics of the deposit user, it depends on the user's wallet deposit (through the deposit of the wallet and the official C2C deposit, does not include the deposit of internal transfer);
bonus.activeFive: 4. A total of 10,000 bonuses will be issued for each award. After the deadline is issued, the TigerMEX may require the users who are involved in the bonus event need to do KYC authentication if they want to withdraw;
bonus.activeSix: 5. Claiming a bonus means that you are a true user of the contract trading. For users who are maliciously seeking bonus and cheating, TigerMEX has the right to dispose of the bonus and bonus income and limit the withdrawal of their accounts;
bonus.activeEight: 6. TigerMEX has the final interpretation of the bonus event.
